_doc: Source Vault — Reference Schema. Author's original research, transcriptions, and observations. Nothing AI-generated belongs in this directory.

entrySchema.text: string — exact words as spoken or written
entrySchema.source: string — citation, e.g. 'Corpus Hermeticum, Poimandres I.25'
entrySchema.subtopic: string — file or tradition slug, e.g. 'corpus-hermeticum'
entrySchema.context: string | null — optional note about why this matters
entrySchema.linkedData: string[] — references to src/data/ files this entry relates to

chartSchema.period: string — historical period, e.g. '1st-3rd century CE'

correspondences._doc: Object keyed by planet name (Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn). Columns vary per tradition.

chartSchema.authorCommentary: array — entries following entrySchema for inline author notes
